abstract.t: This document describes the DHCPv6 Route Option for provisioning static IPv6 routes on a DHCPv6 client..This improves the ability of an operator to configure and influence the client to pick an appropriate route to a destination when the client is multi-homed to routers and where other means of route configuration may be impractical. It is primarily envisaged for implementation on a DHCP client stack of a broadband Residential Gateway (RG) node.
